name: Type

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Returns true if the specified type is equal to the current type; otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: forName
methods.description: Returns the type that corresponds to the specified fully qualified class name.

methods.name: forName
methods.signature: public static System.Type forName(String namespace, String name)
methods.description: Returns the type that corresponds to the specified namespace and class name.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the name of the current type.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns a hash code value for the current type.

methods.name: isAssignableFrom
methods.description: Returns true if an object reference of the specified type can be assigned from the child type; otherwise, returns false.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Creates an instance of the current type and returns this new instance.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the current type, which is the type name.

description: Contains methods for getting the Apex type that corresponds to an Apex class and for
